author: SHANE HENNIGAN / STAFF WRITER
title: Sports Clipboard 10/15/2015
text:
Sign Up Text Alerts | newsletter 
CLIPBOARD 
BASKETBALL — St. Mary’s Youth Basketball will hold registrations for grades K-7 on Monday from 5:30-7:30 p.m. at South Scranton Little League clubhouse on 400 Meadow Ave. 
Holy Rosary Youth Basketball will hold registrations for boys and girls in grades K-8 on Saturday from 9 a.m. to noon and Sunday from noon to 3 p.m. at Holy Rosary Center. 
FUNDRAISER — Penn State vs. Ohio State Bash fundraiser will be Saturday at the Jessup VFW, 205 Dolph St. Cost is $10 and includes pizza and beverages while watching the Penn State/Ohio State football game. Tickets are limited and people must be 21 or older to attend. Proceeds benefit the JYCC field equipment fund at the Jessup Youth Sports Complex. For tickets: Tom Halloran, 570-313-4790. 
YOUTH BASEBALL/SOFTBALL — Electric City Baseball and Softball Academy will host the following: third annual NEPA High School Baseball Prospect Showcase, Nov. 7, 9 a.m.-4:30 p.m. at Riverfront Sports and ECBSA. Cost is $185; seventh annual Winter Skills Camp, Nov. 21, 28, Dec. 5 and 12, 10 a.m.-noon at Riverfront Sports and ECBSA. Cost is $150 or $135 if post-marked by Oct. 21; Christmas Boot Camp, Dec. 26-29, 1-3:30 p.m. at ECBSA. Cost is $99. Additional information: 570-955-0471 or www.electriccitybaseball.com. 
■ East Coast Sandhogs travel baseball organization will hold early bird tryouts for the 2016 season for players ages 7-18 for 8U-18U teams. Tryouts are $15 per player and will be held at Electric City Baseball and Softball Academy on the following dates: Nov. 14, 9 a.m.-11:30 a.m., for ages 7-12 and 1-3:30 p.m. for ages 13-18; and Dec. 5, 9 a.m.-11:30 a.m., for ages 13-18 and 1-3:30 p.m. for ages 7-12. Players need to only attend one tryout. Players must pre-register by visiting www.sandhogsbaseball.com. We welcome user discussion on our site, under the following guidelines: To comment you must first create a profile and sign-in with a verified DISQUS account or social network ID. Sign up here. Comments in violation of the rules will be denied, and repeat violators will be banned. Please help police the community by flagging offensive comments for our moderators to review. By posting a comment, you agree to our full terms and conditions. Click here to read terms and conditions .
